Episodes VII VIII Occupation Jedi Affiliation Canon Rebel Alliance Jedi New Republic New Jedi Order Legends Galactic Alliance Jedi Council Family Padm Amidala mother Anakin Skywalker father Owen Lars step uncle Beru Lars step aunt Leia Organa sister Han Solo brother in law Ben Solo nephew Spouse Mara Jade Legends Children Ben Skywalker Legends Relatives Cliegg Lars step grandfather Shmi Skywalker paternal grandmother Jobal Naberrie maternal grandmother Ruwee Naberrie maternal grandfather Sola Naberrie maternal aunt Legends Jacen Solo nephew Jaina Solo niece Anakin Solo nephew Cade Skywalker descendant Luuke Skywalker clone Homeworld Tatooine homeworld Polis Massa birthplace Luke Skywalker fictional character main protagonist original film trilogy Star Wars franchise created by George Lucas Portrayed by Mark Hamill Luke first appeared in original film returned in Empire Strikes Back Return Jedi Three decades later he portrayed character in Star Wars sequel trilogy beginning with Force Awakens in Last Jedi in Hamill slated reprise his role in upcoming film Rise Skywalker Luke pivotal figure in Rebel Alliance s struggle against Galactic Empire friend eventual brother in law smuggler Han Solo unknown him until Return Jedi twin brother Rebellion leader Princess Leia He trains under Jedi Masters Obi Wan Kenobi Yoda son Anakin Skywalker Padm Amidala He mentors Rey protagonist sequel trilogy maternal uncle Kylo Ren antagonist sequel trilogy character also briefly appears in prequel film Episode III Revenge Sith as an infant non canonical Expanded Universe depicts him as powerful Jedi Master husband Mara Jade father Ben Skywalker maternal uncle Jaina Jacen Anakin Solo Contents Appearances Films Original trilogy New Hope Empire Strikes Back Return Jedi Prequel trilogy Sequel trilogy Force Awakens Last Jedi Rise Skywalker Animated series Video games Novels Heir Jedi Comics Legends Novels Luke Skywalker Shadows Mindor Comic books Video games Characterization Psychoanalytic Religious Concept creation Reception Cultural impact Family tree References Further reading External links Appearances Films Original trilogy Main article Star Wars Trilogy In original Star Wars trilogy Luke Skywalker represents hero archetype young man called adventure hero going out facing trials ordeals coming back after his victory with boon community New Hope Main article Star Wars film In deleted scene preceding character s first appearance in film preserved in film s radio dramatization Luke says goodbye his best friend Biggs Darklighter has just joined Imperial Academy His childhood friends disparagingly call him Wormie In Star Wars Luke lives on moisture farm on desert planet Tatooine with his Uncle Owen Aunt Beru Luke takes his first steps toward his destiny he purchases droids C PO R D While examining R D he sees message from Princess Leia Organa Alderaan R D goes missing Luke goes out search droid saved from band Tusken Raiders by Obi Wan Kenobi an old hermit Luke Obi Wan seek shelter R D plays full message Obi Wan from Leia beseeching him help her defeat Galactic Empire Obi Wan says that he Luke s father were once Jedi Knights that his father was murdered by traitorous Jedi named Darth Vader Obi Wan presents Luke with his father s lightsaber offers take him Alderaan train him in ways Force but Luke rejects his offer Luke changes his mind he returns home find out that Imperial stormtroopers have killed his aunt uncle He Obi Wan then travel Mos Eisley they meet smugglers Han Solo Chewbacca at cantina They team up travel on Millennium Falcon Alderaan only find out that it has been destroyed by Death Star They board Death Star rescue Princess Leia Obi Wan deactivates tractor beam he later sacrifices his life in duel with Vader so that Luke his friends can board Falcon escape During Battle Yavin Luke joins Rebel Alliance in attacking Death Star In trench leading Death Star s exhaust port Luke hears Obi Wan s voice telling him trust his feelings he takes Obi Wan s advice switches off his X wing s missile guidance system instead using Force guide missiles destroy Death Star In film s final scene he joins Han Chewbacca in receiving royal medal from Leia Empire Strikes Back Main article Empire Strikes Back Three years later Luke now commander Rebel Alliance s Rogue Squadron While on mission on ice planet Hoth he captured by wampa but manages escape In frozen wasteland he sees Obi Wan s Force ghost tells him travel planet Dagobah complete his training with Jedi Master Yoda Luke then rescued by Han Empire discovers Rebel base on Hoth Luke leads his squadron battle swarm AT ATs but he forced retreat his wingman killed Escaping in his X wing he travels Dagobah meets Yoda He undergoes rigorous Jedi training quickly increasing his power in Force During his training Luke sees vision his friends in danger Against both Obi Wan Yoda s advice complete his training he travels Bespin save them only be lured into trap He engages in lightsaber duel with Darth Vader As his mentors warned Luke proves be no match Vader Sith Lord overpowers Luke severs his right hand Vader then reveals that he Luke s father offers him chance turn dark side Force rule galaxy at his side Horrified Luke throws himself into deep reactor chasm He survives but pulled into garbage chute underside Cloud City left hanging onto weather vane Leia flying away from Cloud City in Millennium Falcon senses Luke s peril turns ship around save him Aboard ship he hears Vader telepathically telling him that it his destiny join dark side Luke s severed hand replaced with bio mechanical one Return Jedi Main article Return Jedi Luke Skywalker s Jedi robes from Episode VI One year later Luke now Jedi Knight has constructed his own lightsaber He returns Tatooine help Leia droids Lando Calrissian save Han from crime lord Jabba Hutt Luke offers negotiate with Jabba rejects his offer casts him into pit fight rancor Luke kills rancor he sentenced death in Sarlacc Pit Luke escapes with R D s help saving his friends destroying Jabba s sail barge During his return trip Dagobah Luke learns from dying Yoda that Vader indeed his father Luke then learns from Obi Wan s spirit that he has twin sister whom he immediately realizes Leia Jedi Masters tell Luke that he must face Vader again finish his training save galaxy Arriving on Endor as part Rebel commando squad Luke surrenders Vader in an attempt bring his father back from dark side Force Vader brings Luke second Death Star orbiting around Endor his master Emperor Palpatine tries tempt Luke dark side Luke momentarily lashes out at Emperor with his lightsaber but Vader blocks his strike father son once again do battle Luke keeps his emotions under control until Vader senses that Luke has sister threatens turn her dark side if Luke will not submit Luke snaps brutally overpowers Vader severing his father s mechanical right hand Emperor orders Luke kill Vader take his place Luke glances at his own bionic hand realizes that he on verge suffering his father s fate He casts his lightsaber aside declaring himself Jedi Furious Emperor tortures Luke with Force lightning In agony Luke calls out his father help unwilling let his son die Vader kills Emperor by throwing him down reactor shaft but mortally wounded by Emperor s lightning in process As Rebel fighters head toward Death Star s main reactor Luke removes Vader s mask looks upon his father s face first only time redeemed Anakin Skywalker assures Luke that was good in him after all dies On Endor Luke cremates his father s body on funeral pyre During Rebels victory celebrations on Endor Luke sees his father s spirit alongside those Obi Wan Yoda Prequel trilogy Main article Star Wars prequel trilogy In prequel film Revenge Sith Luke his twin sister Leia are born Senator Padm Amidala Following Padm s death on Polis Massa his father s turn dark side Force Luke taken by Obi Wan Kenobi desert planet Tatooine Luke adopted by his father s stepbrother Owen Lars his wife Beru baby Luke portrayed by Aidan Barton son Roger Barton an editor film Sequel trilogy Main article Star Wars sequel trilogy Force Awakens Mark Hamill reprised role Luke in Force Awakens in In first installment sequel trilogy Force Awakens opening crawl reveals that Luke Skywalker had mysteriously vanished some time in years following events Return Jedi Luke went into hiding after his nephew apprentice Ben Solo turned dark side was later dubbed Kylo Ren Ren killed all his fellow apprentices ushered in despotic reign First Order Luke felt responsible disappeared At end film Resistance manage reconstruct map which traces location temple from Empire s archives his location he subsequently found on planet Ahch by young scavenger Rey presents him with lightsaber previously wielded by both Luke his father Art Star Wars Last Jedi notes that Luke s exile reversal from his decision help his friends in Empire Strikes Back Last Jedi In Last Jedi Luke initially reluctant train Rey telling her that it time Jedi Order end After some persuasion from R D Luke starts training Rey but grows increasingly afraid her power Luke tells Rey that he had briefly considered killing sleeping Ben after seeing vision destruction he could cause but immediately relented Ben woke see Luke with his lightsaber drawn turned dark side he felt betrayed Rey urges Luke help her redeem Ben but he refuses Rey leaves Luke visited by spirit Yoda assures Luke that he still has purpose Luke appears on planet Crait as Resistance are staging standoff against First Order he apologizes Leia allowing Ben fall dark side Luke steps in front First Order s artillery unexpectedly survives an onslaught blaster fire ordered by Ren Ren charges at Luke in hand hand combat seemingly bisecting him with his lightsaber but Luke remains unscathed still on Ahch Luke has sent projection himself Crait using Force This distraction allows Resistance escape planet Luke tells Kylo that he will not be last Jedi before his projection vanishes On Ahch Luke collapses then looks off in horizon see planet s two suns setting before he disappears having become one with Force Rise Skywalker Luke has been confirmed appear in Star Wars Rise Skywalker ninth final chapter series Animated series At end Star Wars Rebels episode Twin Suns silhouette Luke Skywalker seen from afar by Obi Wan Kenobi Luke appears in animated Disney micro series Star Wars Forces Destiny with Mark Hamill once again reprising his role episode Path Ahead details him training with Yoda on Dagobah He also appears in episode Traps Tribulations which takes place shortly after Battle Endor shows him Leia assisting Ewoks in stopping rampaging monster known as Gorax Video games Luke also playable character in Star Wars Battlefront II in online multiplayer Star Wars Battlefront Novels Heir Jedi Star Wars Heir Jedi was announced as one first four canon novels be released in Set between New Hope Empire Strikes Back Heir Jedi chronicles adventures Luke as he continues battle Empire with his Rebel friends begins develop his Force abilities novel written from first person perspective Luke only second Star Wars novel attempt this type narrative voice b Comics Luke main character comic Star Wars which takes place between films original trilogy He will also be subject an upcoming manga anthology be released in early Legends See also Star Wars expanded other media In April most licensed Star Wars novels comics produced since originating film Star Wars were rebranded by Lucasfilm as Star Wars Legends declared non canon franchise Legends branded novels comic books video games detail Luke s exploits following Return Jedi Novels In novel Truce at Bakura set one day after battle Endor Luke his friend Wedge Antilles recover message droid from titular planet which was being invaded by Ssi Ruuk Luke commands task force turning back enemy army He also meets Dev Sibwarra Force sensitive human had been captured by Ssi Ruuk killed in battle after turning against his captors In novel Courtship Princess Leia set four years after Battle Endor Luke travels planet Dathomir he discovers group Force sensitive witches called Witches Dathomir banded into two separate groups collective benign matriarchal clans one he in contact with being Singing Mountain Clan witches have turned dark side called Nightsisters Discovering prophecy in which it was told Jedi would change way life on land Luke eventually realizes truly Force first time in his life While he destroys most Nightsisters including powerful leader Gethzirion galaxy s most powerful remaining warlord Warlord Zsinj Thanks help prophecy witches Luke recovers old Jedi records left by Yoda about years prior He decides start new Jedi Academy something he has been trying do six months before start novel by finding old Jedi records archives In Thrawn Trilogy Luke meets former Emperor s Hand Mara Jade bound by Palpatine s disembodied voice that repeatedly commands will kill Luke Skywalker Mara Jade working with her boss fringe galaxy smuggler named Talon Karrde also plays crucial role in this era Although she was ready fulfill that order stop voice circumstances force her keep him alive long enough have him help escape mutual danger Despite her threats Luke learns Mara s curse vows free her from it Meanwhile rest New Republic fighting against Grand Admiral Thrawn thanks Leia s help he eventually defeated although Luke tried several times get near him his ally Joruus C baoth Eventually desperate pair fights against Luke s clone Luuke Skywalker C baoth s apprentice During fight Mara Jade destroys clone with Leia s help destroys C baoth This entire time C baoth has been obsessed with molding Luke Mara serve him perhaps due fact that Spaarti cloning cylinders he was made from have reputation turning people insane later in life Nonetheless C baoth defeated along with Luuke Mara s sacrifice silences her curse completes her reconciliation with Jedi whom she later joins In Jedi Academy trilogy Luke resigns his commission in New Republic s starfighter corps pursue his Jedi studies rebuild Jedi Order in Massassi Temple on Yavin decision some anti Jedi politicians use against him Luke becomes New Jedi Order s leader His students in ways Force include Gantoris Kam Solusar Tionne Streen Cilghal Kirana Ti others He forced contend with spirit ancient Sith Lord Exar Kun lures one his most powerful students Kyp Durron dark side In Hand Thrawn Duology Luke now Jedi Master works again with Mara Jade has learned better her Force knowledge since her training at Luke s Jedi Academy He falls in love with her they eventually marry Later in Edge Victory Rebirth they have son whom they name Ben after Obi Wan Kenobi s pseudonym In New Jedi Order series Luke creates New Jedi Council He idealises new conclave made up Jedi politicians military officers Included in this new Jedi Order are Tresina Lobi Kenth Hammer Kyle Katarn Kyp Durron Cilghal Saba Sebatynee himself From politicians military came new Chief State Cal Omas Admiral Sienn Sovv Sullustan male four others In Force Heretic Remnant he spearheads mission into Unknown Regions during Yuuzhan Vong invasion find mysterious planet Zonama Sekot planet that creates living starships After invasion defeated with help new Mandalorian Warriors Sekotian fleet Galactic Alliance Imperial Remnant fleet Luke leads New Jedi Order on Denon temporary capital Galactic Alliance site newly rebuilt Jedi Temple on Coruscant In Swarm War New Jedi Order moves Ossus site former famous Jedi temples libraries that were mostly destroyed years prior Upon Killik s invasion Chiss space transformation most Myrkr mission survivors into Killik Joiners Luke determines that Killik s collective mind being unconsciously controlled by hive called Dark Nest Dark Nest controlled by former Nightsister named Lomi Plo became Unseen Queen with her ability become invisible by exploiting doubts inferiors One Myrkr mission survivors Alema Rar attempted plant seeds doubt in Luke s mind by suggesting that his wife Mara may be somehow responsible death his mother Padm Amidala which he almost believes Mara s previous involvement as Emperor s Hand This allows Lomi escape from Luke Luke discovers recordings his father Force choking his mother on Mustafar his own birth his mother s death hidden inside protective memory archives R D this he able overcome his doubts about Mara defeat Lomi Plo in final battle Swarm War cutting her into four pieces Luke also withdraws Jedi from Cal Omas Advisory Council as he plans create New Jedi Council that will give aid Galactic Alliance needed He also becomes Grand Master New Jedi Order give Jedi clear sense direction He has told Jedi either follow his leadership make order priority leave Jedi Danni Quee Tenel Ka have resigned duties Zonoma Sekot Hapes respectively while Corran Horn tries resign but Luke talks him out it Luke also forced exile Tahiri Lowbacca Tesar Sebatayne Dagobah divulging secret information people outside New Jedi Order In Legacy Force series Luke begins having visions figure cloaked in darkness destroying galaxy Jedi Decree In his dreams this figure s presence much like that Darth Vader Luke has been troubled by fact that he has been unable discern identity this figure Complicating matters even more recent schism that has developed between Luke his nephew Jacen Solo Already tremendously powerful Jedi Knight Jacen has begun adopting radical extreme interpretations Force causing dramatic change in his personality Luke fears that Jacen pursuing same path that ultimately led Anakin Skywalker s fall dark side In Bloodlines situation worsens Luke s son Ben becomes Jacen s apprentice Luke must also battle his wife refuses confront Jacen fear alienating Ben In Tempest Luke determines that dark figure from his dreams Lumiya former Emperor s Hand now known as Dark Lady Sith Luke Lumiya had fought several times over years but Mara murdered in Sacrifice Lumiya deceives Luke into believing that she killed her They battle again Luke saves weaponless Lumiya from falling her death simply so that he can kill her himself Luke returns Coruscant he found by Ben standing guard over Mara s body upon speaking with his son he realizes that Lumiya could not have killed her Later in his private cabin Luke breaks down over death his wife knowing that her murderer still at large He does not realize that killer his own nephew Jacen has now taken Sith name Darth Caedus In Revelation Ben proves that Jacen killed Mara but Luke now reluctant kill Jacen out fear that he his son will fall dark side in process decision taken out his hands in Invincible Jaina kills Jacen in final lightsaber duel In Fate Jedi novels set about years after first film Luke Skywalker now in his early sixties deposed by government from his position as Grand Master exiled from Coruscant However if he finds reason Jacen Solo fell dark side he can be allowed return Ben insists on coming with him Together father son explore dangerous little known portions galaxy Luke Ben learn much about each other about Force about great dangers threatening Jedi great love two surviving Skywalkers have each other grows even greater as they repeatedly save each other s lives explore limits powers mysteries Force Luke Skywalker Shadows Mindor Main article Luke Skywalker Shadows Mindor It has been suggested that Luke Skywalker Shadows Mindor be merged into this article Discuss Proposed since July Comic books Luke Skywalker appears in Marvel published Star Wars comics adaptations original trilogy as well as an ongoing series that ran from Dark Horse acquired license two years later he appeared in numerous projects based on franchise as well In Star Wars Legacy set years after events original films Luke appears as spirit in Force his descendant Cade Skywalker persuades him once again become Jedi in order defeat evil Darth Krayt his burgeoning Sith empire Video games An older wiser Luke Skywalker also appears in Jedi Knight II Jedi Outcast Jedi Knight Jedi Academy video games at rank Jedi Master In Jedi Outcast Luke helps Kyle Katarn in his fight against Desann Empire Reborn by driving them away from Valley Jedi Luke appears in game Star Wars Force Unleashed in downloadable alternate storyline Starkiller duels Luke He also appears in Disney Lucasfilm video game Star Wars Commander Luke also playable character in Disney Infinity Characterization Psychoanalytic Each Star Wars characters instantiates one archetypes in Joseph Campbell s Hero s journey with Luke Skywalker symbolizing Hero archetype As such he formulaic relatable protagonist encounters basic struggle between good evil in same way as other heroic figures such as Harry Potter Bilbo Baggins Jesus Christ Luke s central dilemma ongoing war between good evil both externally internally Like most protagonists emerging from this storytelling formula Luke not raised by his biological parents Religious Some argue that Luke mirrors fundamental values Christianity Abrahamic religion Luke s journey often compared that Jesus Christ Scholars argue that Luke Christ like figure while Yoda represents god Darth Vader represents temptations evil Luke s struggle between good evil contrasted with that his father Anakin Skywalker in way that represents story Prodigal Son Concept creation Luke was variously conceived as year old grizzled war hero later as Jedi Master as woman In an interview about his early drafts Lucas said first version talked about princess an old general second version involved father his son his daughter daughter was heroine film Now daughter has become Luke Mark Hamill s character was also story two brothers transformed one them into sister older brother was imprisoned young sister had rescue him bring him back dad Though Luke s surname was Skywalker in Lucas s treatment Star Wars it was changed Starkiller in subsequent drafts at one point featuring in title Star Wars From Adventures Luke Starkiller Starkiller surname remained first few months production Hamill used name Luke Starkiller sole time he referred himself during filming dubbed Skywalker in film Starkiller was dropped due Lucas called unpleasant connotations with Charles Manson An alternative ending pitched by George Lucas Return Jedi was Luke assuming his father s role as Darth Vader after latter s death intending rule in his place Though Lawrence Kasdan favored idea Lucas ultimately declined since films were made children Another conclusion film featured character disappearing into wilderness akin Clint Eastwood in spaghetti westerns According Mark Hamill during filming original Star Wars film George Lucas asked him if he would reprise role cameo he was in his s pass torch next generation In Hamill stated that his return franchise would be either be another plane existence not same character Hamill learned sequel trilogy over summer at Star Wars Celebration during lunch Lucas told him one was in development Hamill recalled shaving his beard portray Trickster in Flash then letting it grow back filming Star Wars Luke s lack screen time in Force Awakens was due concerns by screenwriter Michael Arndt that his presence would mean audience would have less interest in protagonist Rey leading an agreement that he be removed from screen instead become plot device Hamill attended meetings script readings helped conceal Luke s role in film instead dialogue he read stage directions Abrams said it allowed him remain involved that his reading helped make better experience everyone According concept designer Christian Alzmann Luke s appearance in Last Jedi was partly inspired by that Colonel Kurtz in Apocalypse Now Reception In Luke Skywalker was selected by Empire magazine as th greatest movie character all time Empire also ranked him as third greatest Star Wars character Luke was also on ballot American Film Institute s Years Heroes Villains On list Greatest Fictional Characters Fandomania com ranked Luke at number IGN listed Luke as th top Star Wars character he was chosen twice by IGN s readers as one favorite Star Wars characters IGN s Jesse Schedeen also picked Luke Skywalker as one characters they most wanted appear on Wii as well as listing Skywalker as one favorite Star Wars heroes Schedeen also listed character as one Star Wars characters they wanted see in Soulcalibur IGN also called fight between Luke Skywalker Darth Vader in Return Jedi one ultimate movie boss battles In feature on speeches made by Luke Skywalker IGN s Todd Gilchrist said that his favorite speech made by Luke was am Jedi like my father before me UGO Networks listed Luke as one best heroes all time he was voted as one coolest Star Wars characters by UGO s readers Inventor Dean Kamen has also code named his new prosthetic arm system Luke in honor character WatchMojo ranked Luke Skywalker as on Top Star Wars Characters list Mark Hamill was nominated Saturn Award Best Actor in his portrayal Luke Skywalker in Star Wars won award his portrayal in Empire Strikes Back Return Jedi Last Jedi In Mark Hamill had serious car accident after filming Star Wars which involved an operation on his face It was speculated that Wampa attack at beginning Empire Strikes Back was written in explain his facial injuries but George Lucas specifically disputed this in DVD commentary Empire Strikes Back In regards Luke s portrayal in Last Jedi many fans expressed disappointment in he was depicted as grumpy old man whose failures had driven him into hiding stark departure in Luke was characterized in original trilogy Hamill originally stated that he pretty much fundamentally disagreed with every choice Last Jedi director Rian Johnson made this character but that he had utmost respect Johnson was willing do his part realize Johnson s vision While regarding possibility younger actor playing role Hamill expressed support towards Sebastian Stan whose physical resemblance young Hamill went viral However he noted that child actor Jacob Tremblay would be his top choice if story were be focused on very young Luke In asked about character s sexual orientation if Luke could be gay Hamill said Luke s sexual orientation meant be interpreted by viewer He added if think Luke gay course he should not be ashamed it Judge Luke by his character not by he loves Hamill later said that he considered possibility that Luke could have found love between Episode VI Episode VII Cultural impact Forty years after his first onscreen appearance Skywalker remains be an American icon In fact Luke Skywalker often still used by child psychotherapists help children project thoughts state being in way that understandable both child therapist Another way that therapists utilize Star Wars in sessions teach patients that Force represents self understanding that they achieve in therapy Children are taught that they are Luke therapist Obi Wan as eventually as Luke no longer needed his mentor patients will one day no longer need therapist Star Wars has been related back cultural events its time such as Cold War Nixon era politics severing Luke s hand Darth Vader s bionic presence supposedly according space com symbolize unity military amputees Family tree Main article Skywalker family v t e Skywalker family tree Aika Lars n Cliegg Lars Shmi Skywalker n Jobal Naberrie n Ruwee Naberrie n Beru Whitesun Owen Lars Anakin Skywalker Padm Amidala Bail Organa n Breha Organa n Luke Skywalker n Leia Organa Han Solo Ben Solo n Notes Appears in Pablo Hidalgo s Star Wars Character Encyclopedia Updated Expanded Anakin was conceived without biological father b Attack Clones Revenge Sith Adopted father Leia Organa as established in Revenge Sith Adopted mother Leia Organa as established in Revenge Sith In non canonical Star Wars Expanded Universe Legends Luke married Mara Jade has son Ben Skywalker In Legends continuity Han Leia have three children Jaina Jacen Anakin Solo References Footnotes Phil Szostak notes that Luke s lightsaber design reflects that Obi Wan Kenobi s first was Michael Stackpole s Expanded Universe novel Jedi Citations Libbey Dirk July Mark Hamill Confirmed Star Wars Episode
